channel.title: I keep getting this reoccurring error with subscription
channel.description: I keep getting this error once every month when my subscription renews, it says I don’t have it when I obviously do. Sometimes this fixes itself over time, sometimes I have to cancel the subscription and sub to get the sounds. All and all, it’s really annoying. If this could be your main priority first that would be amazing! :)
